channel.title: Advanced bash usage
channel.description:
Hi fellas,
During my daily technology watch, I found a pretty interesting article about advanced usage of bash. I guess that it will interest you guys !
http://samrowe.com/wordpress/advancing-in-the-bash-shell/
Hope it helps !
Best, Nitrax
